Package org.beansinc.bobsled_jousting

Class PlayerTeam

java.lang.Object
org.beansinc.bobsled_jousting.BaseTeam
org.beansinc.bobsled_jousting.PlayerTeam
All Implemented Interfaces:
TeamBehaviour
public class PlayerTeam extends BaseTeam implements TeamBehaviour
This class provides the behaviour necessary for the player to control their team. Much of the GUI's behavior is dependent on this class.

    • randomContestantQuit

      public Contestant randomContestantQuit(float difficulty) throws BSExceptions.ContestantNotFound, BSExceptions.InvalidTeamSize, BSExceptions.InvalidObjectAttributeType
      Checks if a random contestant quit. If they quit they get removed from the team.
      Specified by:
      randomContestantQuit in interface TeamBehaviour
      Parameters:
      difficulty - the difficulty
      Returns:
      Contestant If the a contestant quit, then that contestant would be returned. Otherwise, a new contestant with the name "null" will be returned.
      Throws:
      BSExceptions.ContestantNotFound - the contestant not found
      BSExceptions.InvalidTeamSize - the invalid team size
      BSExceptions.InvalidObjectAttributeType - the invalid object attribute type

    • randomContestantStatIncrease

      public ArrayList<Contestant[]> randomContestantStatIncrease(float difficulty)
      Randomly increases the stats of selected contestants.
      Specified by:
      randomContestantStatIncrease in interface TeamBehaviour
      Parameters:
      difficulty - the difficulty
      Returns:
      ArrayList<Contestant[]> An ArrayList of {Upgraded Contestant, Old contestant} pairs. Not upgraded contestants are not included.
